HealthcareProviderNpi.name: HealthcareProviderNpi
HealthcareProviderNpi.description: Represents identifiers from the National Provider Identifier that are assigned to every facility and licensed practitioner in the United States. Also includes NPI assigned date, primary mailing address on file, and so on.

AccountId.description: Name of the facility that this NPI belongs to.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date from which this NPI is effective.

EffectiveTo.description: The date on which this NPI is no longer effective.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the record is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Practitioner or facility name as listed in the NPI database.

Npi.description: Ten-digit identifier for a provider from the National Plan and Provider Enumeration System.

NpiType.description: Identifies whether the NPI is for an individual or an organization.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PractitionerId.description: Name of the practitioner that this NPI belongs to.

SourceSystem.description: System from which the record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of the system from which the record was sourced.
